messages.content:
It doesn't have to be like this.
I don’t accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won’t let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.
There's so much at stake in this election and it's in your hands.
I’m talking about your job. I’m talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Cambridge. I’m talking about your right to live, work and travel across Europe.
This election is about voting for what you believe in.
Unlike Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour, the Liberal Democrats WILL fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future.
And the way we’ll do it is simple.
If in two years’ time Theresa May brings us a bad Brexit deal, YOU should be able to vote on it and have the option to stay in the EU. If Theresa May brings back a poisoned apple, we shouldn’t have to eat it if you don’t want to.
It’s your choice, it’s your future – help change it by voting Liberal Democrat on 8th June.
With thanks and best wishes
Tim Farron
Leader of the Liberal Democrats
PS – Join the millions like you and use your postal vote to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future. Vote for the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tim Farron's Liberal Democrats will give you a say on the final Brexit deal. If Theresa May’s final Brexit deal is a poisoned apple, you should have a vote on it.

community.content: I’m talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Cambridge.

quotes.text: Every major party except the Lib Dems are supporting Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. It’s lunatic to have an overtly anti-EU MP called leader of the opposition.

images.caption: Tim Farron’s Lib Dems will give you a say on the final Brexit deal.
If her final Brexit deal is a poisoned apple... Why should you have to eat it?
Labour won’t - they voted with UKIP and the Tories for Brexit.
